entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Params keyword with JSImport #96112
  • Mixed Assembly Loading in .NET #96110

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: aot export api stdcall,UnmanagedCallersOnly for vb6 #96103
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement targeting iOS-like platforms rather than pretending to be macOS #87610
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use lowercase arm64 in CMakePresets.json #96111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add non generic overload for retrieving keyed services #96109
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • Simplify AdditionalSharedFrameworkToInstallArguments in workloads-testing.targets #96107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Avoid creating rgctx trampolines to call gshared methods … #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fix the order of parameters stored on the stack #96106
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Rename IsOSXLike to IsApplePlatform in libraries #96098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rename IsMacOS to IsApplePlatform in the JIT #96090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAot: Remove never-defined FEATURE_RWX_MEMORY #96100
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • extract side-effects from op1 of GT_COMMA #96077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_ALWAYS fall-through check in Compiler::fgFindInsertPoint #96070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix passing of valuetypes with a non-8 byte aligned size on arm64+ios/macos. #96079
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SynthesizedReadOnlyListTypeSymbol.Create should check for MissingMetadataTypeSymbol for missing types #71297
    17.9
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (IEnumerable<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71296

PullRequests

Merged

  • Rename generated AnalysisLevelStyle_xxx.editorconfig to AnalysisLevelStyle_xxx.globalconfig #71298
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52866
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52865
  • Perf regression: https #52864
  • Perf regression: caching, https, https #52863
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext #52862
  • Slow model binding on first requests #52861
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52859
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52858
  • Blazor Web App with Microsoft Entra External ID Exhibits Inconsistent Unauthorized Access Behavior #52856

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #52789
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #52857

PullRequests

Updated

  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.windows::34.0.64 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" #19466
  • Double tap gesture NullReferenceException when navigating #19465
  • Views are not vertically centre when layout vertical layout option is set to centre #19464
  • [UITEst] Windows Controls Unpackaged occasionally crashes with IndexOutOfRangeException #19463
    Backlog

Closed

  • [UITesting] Add device logs are not published #19038
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] Matrix tests are failing consistency (sometimes) on CI #18735
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Merged

  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Closed
